name: Colored Squares
description: Artwork by Vera Molner of squares in a grid with some ranomness. The Idea was to recreate his work. I started with a code from Garrit, figured out the valules and changed according to the artwork so that it looked the same. I took some help to understand by Chatgpt and added colors.

name: Colored Squares V1
description: Artwork by Vera Molner of squares in a grid with some ranomness. The Idea was to recreate his work with a twist. With the recreation there, I experimented with values and added a noise from an earlier tutorial

name: Colored Squares V2
description: Artwork by Vera Molner of squares in a grid with some ranomness. The Idea was to recreate his work with a twist. With the recreation there, I experimented with values and added a noise to the colors with some help of GPT

name: Vera Molnar
description: Artwork by Vera Molner of vertexes in a grid with some ranomness. The Idea was to recreate her work. I started with a code from Garrit, changed the vertexes to match the artwork and then continued with variation to add color and other interesting aspects to the artwork.

name: Vera Molnar 2
description: Artwork by Vera Molner of vertexes in a grid with some ranomness. The Idea was to recreate her work. I started with a code from Garrit, changed the vertexes to match the artwork and then continued with variation to add color and other interesting aspects to the artwork.

name: Vera Molnar 3
description: Artwork by Vera Molner of vertexes in a grid with some ranomness. The Idea was to recreate her work. I started with a code from Garrit, changed the vertexes to match the artwork and then continued with variation to add color and other interesting aspects to the artwork.

name: Square Space
description: A controled flow field shaped as a square with some randomness to it. The initial idea was to take an existing flow field and controle it. I experimented with values on the flow field and added gradient with blue and purple. I then manipulated the the vertexes to make them follow a desired shape

name: Square Space 2
description: A controled flow field shaped as a circle with some randomness to it. The initial idea was to take an existing flow field and controle it. I experimented with values on the flow field and added gradient with blue and purple. I then manipulated the the vertexes to make them follow a desired shape

name: Square Space 3
description: A controled flow field with lines that goes closer and closer to a shape in the middle of the screen. The initial idea was to take an existing flow field and controle it. I experimented with values on the flow field and added gradient with blue and purple. I then manipulated the the vertexes to make them follow a desired shape
